name: Comet
description: Comet Eggs have become the latest trend in interstellar haute cuisine. Discriminating chefs everywhere choose Comet Eggs for their striking orange yolks, which beautify everything from pastries and pastas to soufflés and sauces.
Comet Eggs transform ordinary recipes and old favorites into something truly out of this world!

text: Comet Eggs have become the latest trend in interstellar haute cuisine. Discriminating chefs everywhere choose Comet Eggs for their striking orange yolks, which beautify everything from pastries and pastas to soufflés and sauces.

moreOptions.name: Pasture Raised Organic
moreOptions.description: Our pasture raised organic eggs are delicious! These eggs come exclusively from hens who enjoy the many benefits of sunshine, fresh air and water, and lots of room to roam on family farms.

moreOptions.name: Pasture Raised
